availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Trimble County, Kentucky, native. Married to Elizabeth Tyra. Father of Susan Tyra, Catherine Tyra, Allen Tyra, John Tyra, Jane Tyra, William Tyra, Margaret Tyra, Mary Tyra, and Joseph Tyra. Resident of Trimble County in 1840. Farmer in Trimble County in 1850. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 322.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, District 2, p. 384B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 220-221.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, Bedford, p. 179A.
